name: traefik
description:
Traefik is a modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer written in go. It supports several backends (Docker, Swarm mode, Kubernetes, Marathon, Consul, Etcd, Rancher, Amazon ECS, and a lot more) to manage its configuration automatically and dynamically. 

See https://docs.traefik.io for more information.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Preview packages should never be used in production!
postInstallNotes:
Traefik DC/OS Service has been successfully installed!
See https://docs.traefik.io for documentation.
postUninstallNotes: Traefik DC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
